name: Spores (Quartzified Studios)
description:
Spores is a simple casual game.
(Get on Mobile or the Standalone for the Best Experience)

Eat other "Spores" to grow in size and don't get eaten by Poisonous Spores.

- Eat Green Spores to increase in size and gain Points
- Get hit 5 times by Poisonous Spores to end your run.

Currently, Spores has 5 Different Game Modes.

Classic
- Spores will appear from all directions.

Rain
- Spores will be raining from above

Growth
- You can only eat Spores that are smaller than you.
- Bigger Spores are Poisonous.

Missile
- Spore will follow you for a short time.

Survival
- Only Poisonous Spores will appear around you.

You can also collect a Mutation to shrink yourself in size.
